metadata.name: Calmness before Chaos
metadata.description:
In this piece I captured the fleeting nature of tranquility in the face of impending chaos. This scene features a serene winter landscape, with a mystical lake reflecting a snowy mountain in the horizon. Trees surround the lake, creating a sense of solitude.
In the center, a person in a boat glides through the calm waters, showing the beauty of living in the present moment.

This is a piece to contemplate and reflect, pondering the transience of peaceful moments and the inevitability of change.
